vote.text: Amendment SA 4044 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4044 proposed by Senator Sullivan for Senator Murkowski to Amendment SA 4043. (consideration: CR S6503) To improve the amendment.
